description: Apply for a new Aadhar card
Reapply for a lost or misplaced Aadhar card
Change address or phone number on Aadhar
Correct spelling mistakes in Aadhar card

steps.title: Locate nearest Aadhaar enrolment center
steps.description: Visit the official UIDAI website to find your nearest Aadhaar Kendra.

steps.title: Book appointment (optional)
steps.description: Schedule a time slot online for faster processing at Aadhaar Seva Kendra.

steps.title: Fill the enrolment form
steps.description: Complete the Aadhaar enrolment form with accurate personal details.

steps.title: Submit biometric and document verification
steps.description: Provide fingerprints, iris scan, photograph, and supporting documents.

steps.title: Receive acknowledgement slip
steps.description: Collect the slip containing your enrolment ID to track application.

steps.title: Download Aadhaar card (after issuance)
steps.description: Download e-Aadhaar from the UIDAI website once it's ready.

alternatives.Online Method: For updates, use the UIDAI portal (https://uidai.gov.in) or mAadhaar app.

offline_alternatives: Aadhaar Seva Kendra, General Post Office, Panaji, Goa

description: Apply for a new Driving License
documents: Age Proof – Birth Certificate, School Certificate
Medical Certificate (Form 1A) for applicants over 40 years

steps.title: Visit Sarathi Parivahan Website
steps.description: Go to the Ministry of Road Transport’s official Sarathi website or Goa RTO portal.

steps.title: Select License Type
steps.description: Choose to apply for a Learner’s or Permanent Driving License.

steps.title: Fill the application form
steps.description: Enter your personal details, address, vehicle class, and upload documents and photo.

steps.title: Book slot for test
steps.description: Choose a date and time for the learner’s or permanent driving test at your nearest RTO.

steps.title: Appear for driving test
steps.description: Attend the driving skill test and theory test (if applicable).

steps.title: License issuance
steps.description: If you pass, your license will be issued digitally and sent physically via post.

alternatives.Offline Application: You can visit the nearest RTO office and submit Form 2 for LL/DL manually.

steps.title: Choose business structure
steps.description: Decide on the legal structure of your business, such as Proprietorship, Partnership, LLP, or Private Limited Company.

steps.title: Get Digital Signature Certificate (DSC)
steps.description: Obtain a DSC for authorized signatories to ensure secure and verified digital filings.

steps.title: Register on Goa Business Portal
steps.description: Create an account and log in to the official Goa Single Window portal to start the registration process.

steps.title: Submit application and pay fee
steps.description: Fill out the application form with business details, upload required documents, and pay the applicable fee online.

steps.title: Get registration certificate
steps.description: After verification by the authorities, download your official business registration certificate from the portal.

alternatives.PAN Card: Visit your nearest PAN facilitation center to apply manually.

offline_alternatives: Directorate of Industries, Trade & Commerce, Udyog Bhavan, Panaji, Goa
MSME Facilitation Center, Verna Industrial Estate, Goa

description: Reissue lost or damaged PAN card
Change name or address on PAN card
documents: Date of Birth Proof (Birth Certificate/Matriculation Certificate)

steps.title: Fill PAN application form
steps.description: Complete Form 49A online on the NSDL or UTIITSL website.

steps.title: Upload documents
steps.description: Upload scanned copies of required identity, address, and DOB proofs.

steps.title: Pay fee and submit
steps.description: Pay the processing fee online and submit the application.

steps.title: Receive PAN card
steps.description: After verification, PAN card will be delivered by post.

offline_alternatives: PAN Facilitation Center, Income Tax Department, Panaji, Goa

documents: Proof of Residence Duration (like old utility bills, school certificates, etc.)

steps.title: Prepare required documents
steps.description: Gather all necessary documents proving your identity, address, and duration of residence.

steps.title: Visit Goa Online Portal
steps.description: Login or register at the Goa Online portal to apply for the residence certificate.

steps.title: Fill out application form
steps.description: Enter personal details, residential address, duration of stay, and upload relevant documents.

steps.title: Pay applicable fees
steps.description: Pay the application fee online using UPI/net banking/card.

steps.title: Download residence certificate
steps.description: After verification by the revenue department, download the residence certificate from the portal.

alternatives.Online Portal: If unable to access online portal, you can submit physical forms to the local panchayat or municipality.

offline_alternatives: Municipal Office depending on your area

documents: Caste Proof (Parent’s caste certificate, School leaving certificate, etc.)

steps.title: Gather supporting documents
steps.description: Ensure availability of caste proof, ID, and address documents along with a self-declaration.

steps.title: Apply via Goa Online Portal
steps.description: Login or register on the Goa Online portal and go to the 'Caste Certificate' service.

steps.title: Fill and submit application
steps.description: Complete the form with personal, caste, and address details, and upload scanned documents.

steps.title: Track status
steps.description: You can track the status of your application on the Goa Online portal.

steps.title: Download caste certificate
steps.description: After successful verification, download the caste certificate digitally signed by the authority.

alternatives.Offline Submission: Visit local Talathi or Mamlatdar office with original documents for manual application.

documents: Any valid ID proof (for re-verification, optional)

steps.title: Locate Aadhaar Seva Kendra
steps.description: Find the nearest Aadhaar Enrolment/Update Centre authorized by UIDAI.

steps.title: Book an appointment (optional)
steps.description: Visit UIDAI website to book an appointment or directly walk in to the centre.

steps.title: Visit the center in person
steps.description: Carry your original Aadhaar card and recent passport-sized photograph.

steps.title: Submit biometrics and form
steps.description: Fill the Aadhaar Update Form and provide biometric authentication at the center.

steps.title: Pay update fee and get receipt
steps.description: Pay the nominal Aadhaar update fee and collect the acknowledgement slip.

steps.title: Check update status online
steps.description: Use the acknowledgement number to check update status on UIDAI portal.

alternatives.Photograph Update: Must be done in person; no online photograph update is allowed as per UIDAI policy.

offline_alternatives: Aadhaar Seva Kendra, Post Office, Panaji
Common Service Center (CSC) in your locality
Registrar Office authorized for Aadhaar updates

documents: Age Proof (if applying for first time) – Birth Certificate, School Certificate

steps.title: Visit National Voter Portal
steps.description: Go to the official National Voter Services Portal (NVSP) or Goa CEO website.

steps.title: Select the appropriate form
steps.description: Choose Form 6 for new registration, Form 8 for corrections, Form 7 for deletion.

steps.title: Fill in application form
steps.description: Provide personal details, address, and upload the required documents and photograph.

steps.title: Submit application
steps.description: Submit the application online and note the reference number for tracking.

steps.title: Verification by BLO
steps.description: A Booth Level Officer (BLO) will visit your residence for verification.

steps.title: Receive voter ID card
steps.description: Post verification, download the digital card or wait for physical delivery by post.

alternatives.Offline Application: You can fill and submit Form 6 manually at the nearest Electoral Registration Office (ERO).
